name: forest-client-frontend
description: Frontend for Forests Client Management System project
author: Maria Martinez, Paulo Cruz, and Bruno Marchi

scripts.preview: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=test VITE_GREEN_DOMAIN=green-domain.com start-server-and-test stub http://127.0.0.1:8080 start
scripts.preview:test: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=test VITE_GREEN_DOMAIN=green-domain.com start-server-and-test stub:test http://127.0.0.1:8080 start
scripts.coverage: npm run test:unit && npm run test:component && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=test VITE_GREEN_DOMAIN=green-domain.com VITE_FEATURE_FLAGS={\"RELATED_CLIENTS\":true} start-server-and-test preview:test http://127.0.0.1:3000 'cypress run --headless'
scripts.pretest:report:merge: rm -rf reports-merge && mkdir -p reports-merge && for name in component e2e unit; do cp reports/$name/coverage-final.json reports-merge/$name.json; done
scripts.test:report:merge: mkdir -p .nyc_output && rm -rf coverage && nyc --config nyc.config.json merge reports-merge &&  mv coverage.json .nyc_output/out.json && nyc --config nyc.config.json report --reporter lcov --reporter text-summary --report-dir coverage --temp-dir .nyc_output
scripts.test:report:clean: rm -rf reports && mkdir -p reports/.nyc_output/processinfo && mkdir -p coverage
scripts.test:build: cross-env VITE_MODE=test VITE_NODE_ENV=test VITE_GREEN_DOMAIN=green-domain.com start-server-and-test preview http://127.0.0.1:3000 'cypress open'
scripts.test:flush: rm -rf reports && rm -rf .nyc_output && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf reports-merge
scripts.test:unit:devtools: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=test NODE_ENV=test vitest run --inspect-brk --pool threads --poolOptions.threads.singleThread
